title: 78% of consumers more loyal to purpose-driven brands according to 2023 Edelman Trust Barometer
statement: 2023 Edelman Trust Barometer data shows 78% of consumers are more loyal to brands that stand for something bigger than profit.

citations.quote: 2023 data from the Edelman Trust Barometer shows that 78% of consumers say they are more loyal to brands that stand for something bigger than profit.
